amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase, by transfer, funding for state extended care facilities for veterans by $10 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to increase (by transfer) for grants for construction of State Extended Care Facilities by $10 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garrett (NJ) amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 206 - 211 (Roll no. 496).
